pageContent: Objective: The aim of this study was to prospectively assess the development of 24 urinary, gastrointestinal and sexual symptoms in patients with prostate cancer (PCa) during and after image-guided volumetric modulated arc therapy (IG-VMAT).

metaData.source:
Nursing assessment of sexual function following permanent prostate brachytherapy for patients with early-stage prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/12240487/
